Title: The Whirly Dirly Conspiracy
Writer: Justin Roiland (created by), Dan Harmon (created by), Ryan Ridley, Jane Becker (executive story editor), Jessica Gao (executive story editor), Sarah Carbiener (story editor), Erica Rosbe (story editor)
Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer, Sarah Chalke
Plot: Rick takes Jerry on a sympathy adventure to a resort where everyone is immortal when there, and Jerry meets some old acquaintances of Rick's who want payback.
